title: Avram Grant
summary: Avraham "Avram" Grant (Hebrew: אברהם "אברם" גרנט‎; born (1955-05-06)6 May 1955) is an Israeli football manager. Grant has spent the majority of his career coaching and managing in Israel, winning a number of national league and cup victories with different teams, and also managing the Israel national team for four years.
